name: The Warhorn
description: The Warhorn is a medieval RPG mixed with city-building and management elements. Play as an adventurer who decided to leave his dull life as a lumberjack behind to explore a dangerous world full of puzzles in the pursuit of the most valuable relic mankind has ever seen: The Warhorn!
minimum_requirements: OS: 64-bit Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5-3330 or AMD FX 8320 Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 2GB or AMD HD7770 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 11 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: 64-bit Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 9590 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 4GB or AMD Radeon R9 280 3GB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 11 GB available space
